means: 降低质量（地位、价格等）( debase的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He said parliament and the process of democracy had been debased.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说议会和民主程序已遭贬值。

sentence.Network_en: Politicians have debased the meaning of the word "freedom"
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们贬低了“自由”一词的意义。

sentence.Network_en: Fortune-telling is a very much debased art surrounded by superstition.
sentence.Network_cn: 算命是一种非常低级的把戏，充满了迷信色彩。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... debase 降低 debased 贬低的；品质恶劣的 rebellion 反叛；反抗.
求~以d开头d结尾的英语单词_百度知道 ... deathwound 致命伤 debased 下贱的 deceased 已故的.
完整版雅思词汇词根_百度文库 ... base 基础) debased 被贬低的 bat=hit 打近义词根.
【食品词典】D1_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... debase 降低质量 debased 低质量的 debittreing yeast 脱苦叶酵母.

list.abs: (2) [debase oneself]∶屈身事人不为五斗米折腰向乡里小人。——梁· 萧统《文选·陶渊明传》 安能摧眉折腰事权贵,使我不得开心颜。——唐· 李白《梦游.
For a man will not debase himself by work , which requires neither skill nor courage ., 一个人不会因既不要求技巧也不要求勇气的工作而贬低自己.

following analysis the intention of assets debasing the author put forward some countermeasures to perfect and normalize assets debasing accounting information in terms of problems there .通过对资产减值会计的实质内涵的确认与计量的分析，应针对资产减值会计信息中存在的问题，采取完善和规范资产减值会计信息的对策。
The lasting war debased the value of the dollar ., 持久的战争使美元贬值.

entry.tran: 降低…的价值（或质量）；使贬值
entry.def: To debase something means to reduce its value or quality.

example.ex: Politicians have debased the meaning of the word 'freedom'...
example.tran: 政客们贬低了“自由”一词的意义。

example.ex: He said parliament and the process of democracy had been debased.
example.tran: 他说议会和民主程序已遭贬值。

auth_sentence.content: Words which convey ideas of dignity...are in time debased.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Words which convey ideas of dignity...are in time debased.

auth_sentence.content: Epstein's work was...savaged for its 'debased Indo-Chinese style'.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Epstein's work was...savaged for its 'debased Indo-Chinese style'.

auth_sentence.content: They simply resented their stepfather...as a debased version of human existence.
auth_sentence.res_content: They simply resented their stepfather...as a debased version of human existence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They simply resented their stepfather...as a debased version of human existence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: base低下,基础+born出生→adj.出生低微的
debase降低+ed……的→adj.贬低的;品质恶劣的
base低下,基础+ball球→建立基础打球→垒球
base低下,基础+ment具体物→n.地下室
base低下的+ness表名词→n.卑鄙, 下贱
sub下+base低下,基础→地基下的地基
